modules.description: This module connects to a PostgreSQL database using a MirageOS-compatible Lwt-based stack, providing a `connect` function that initializes a database connection given a network stack. It integrates with MirageOS time, clock, and randomization primitives to support asynchronous database operations in unikernel environments. Use it to establish and manage PostgreSQL connections in MirageOS applications requiring persistent storage.

This module enables PostgreSQL database connectivity in MirageOS unikernels by leveraging Lwt for asynchronous operations and integrating with MirageOS primitives for time, clock, and randomization. It provides a `connect` function that initializes a database connection using a network stack, supporting non-blocking I/O and secure communication. Developers can use it to perform database queries and transactions from MirageOS applications, enabling persistent data storage and retrieval in cloud-native or embedded environments. Example usage includes connecting to a remote PostgreSQL instance over a MirageOS network stack to execute SQL commands asynchronously.
